content: This is a question/comment from a balloter regarding our IG. Some of the content for the Questionnaire overview in the IG is auto-generated by the IG publisher (such as the cardinality and the datatype). There is a notation that there is an Enable When, but there is nothing showing which linkIDs are involved in the Enable When. Is our IG malfunctioning? Should there be some extra notation automatically appearing to describe the Enable When conditions? Enable-When-blank.png
where is this? There should be something following that with the details

http://hl7.org/fhir/us/sirb/2021Sep/Questionnaire-sirb-adverse-event-questionnaire.html or
http://hl7.org/fhir/us/sirb/2021Sep/Questionnaire-sirb-continuing-review-questionnaire.html or any of the others in our IG.
